function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in the air of a ward managing patients with COVID-19.","Impact":"Potential risk of healthcare professionals becoming infected during patient care.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective air filtration systems to reduce the viral load and remove larger droplets that can facilitate fomite-associated spread.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems designed to remove bioaerosols and viral particles.","People":"Healthcare professionals and patients in the ward managing COVID-19 patients.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and management."},{"Description":"Presence of a range of bacteria, yeasts, and other respiratory viruses in the air of hospital rooms.","Impact":"Increased risk of nosocomial infections and respiratory illnesses.","Mitigation":"Implementation of air filtration systems to reduce the burden of respirable particles and remove pathogens.","Technologies":"Air filtration systems designed to remove a broad range of bioaerosols and pathogens.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, and visitors in hospital rooms.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and management."},{"Description":"Uncertainty regarding the impact of air filtration on nosocomial infections.","Impact":"Lack of clarity on the effectiveness of air filtration in reducing hospital-acquired infections.","Mitigation":"Conduct robust studies on the effectiveness of air filtration in reducing the transmission of airborne diseases and update relevant building codes and guidelines.","Technologies":"Research studies to assess the efficacy of air filtration in healthcare settings.","People":"Healthcare researchers, professionals, and regulatory authorities.","Owner":"Healthcare research institutions and regulatory bodies."}]}
